Address: 609 W Jefferson St, Ann Arbor, MI 48103
Description: Neighborhood restaurant with a diner vibe & an outdoor area serving all-day breakfast & lunch.

summary.snippet: "Eggs, bacon, muffins, home fries, biscuits, corned beef hash - all delectable."
"The folks that run the place are great and provide excellent service."
"Quirky little place with delicious entrees and tasty baked goods."

most_relevant.description:
What a cool place! Middle of the block across from the elementary school we almost missed it.

Great breakfast for 3!  Avocado toast on amazing bread with olive oil. Eggs cooked perfectly with fresh biscuits and homemade sausage. We loved the strong coffee (and we’re picky). Super friendly service.

Bit loud - would benefit from some acoustic materials.

Baked goods looked great.

Holy smokes, was this a cool joint! Great sausage and lattes. I got the egg and cheese biscuit and adding sausage was the way to go. The outside seating is quaint in a cute little garden area out back - like having breakfast in a friend's backyard! We showed up just in time because after we got thru the line, the place exploded with customers, and it is clear from the tasty food and cool atmosphere why!
Amazing breakfast cafe near University food was amazing and antiques in the Resturant brought back so many memories.
This is a cool little breakfast and lunch spot. Corned beef hash and biscuits n gravy were good, and so was the service.

This is the epitome of a local hole-in-the-wall gem. Over numerous visits the past few years, I don't think I have even been disappointed. I can endorse nearly the full menu, but you can't go wrong with the simple breakfast if you opt for the ginger sage sausage (a ton of flavor)!

Thank you, it was my sons birthday and I took him to breakfast at this small little market.
I want to say just a couple on things, I love the food, I loved the coffee and the service was exceptional. It was a bit too crowded but what can you expect! it was surely a good place to take your family.  Good Job! Please keep up the good work.

Loved every detail of this neighbourhood restaurant. The food was amazing. The atmosphere was cozy and inviting. The staff was so friendly. I would want to be a regular here! We had the traditional breakfast and an amazing chicken salad sandwich. The fries and home fries were 🤍🤍.
We had breakfast on the back patio and it was the perfect spot to spend a morning, even on a hot day. The "simple breakfast" was very tasty!
